::: {#hero-heading}
**Wei LIU** is a PhD student in Economics at the University of Nottingham Ningbo (UNNC), China. Her research interests include *International Trade, Automation, and Industrial Economics*. She obtained both her bachelor’s and master’s degrees from Jiangxi University of Finance and Economics (JUFE). Also, she is from [Jiujiang](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jiujiang) city, Jiangxi province, it is a city with beautiful views. There are some introduction of the local scenery, link from wikipedia: [Jiujiang](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jiujiang). There is a 5A scenic site, [Mount Lu](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mount_Lu).


## Background

- 2013-2017: Bachelor of International Economics and Trade, Jiangxi University of Finance & Economics
- 2017-2021: PICC Property & Casualty Company Limited, Shenzhen Branch, Deputy Team Manager
- 2022-2024: Master of International Business, Jiangxi University of Finance & Economics
- 2024-present: PhD of Economics, Nottingham University of Ningbo, China

:::
